select.if: SELECT a.article_title AS title, u.avatar, u.nickname, c.comment_content AS content, c.type_id, c.type, c.create_time AS time FROM t_comment AS c INNER JOIN t_article AS a ON c.type_id = a.id AND c.id = #{commentId} AND c.type = #{type} INNER JOIN sys_user AS u ON c.comment_user_id = u.id
